text: trading a small amount of money, even with really good returns is not going to become your future wealth most likely. We need to save. We need to save very aggressively. That's the ugly truth. The ugly truth is starting with the 10,000 account and then watching that YouTube video about this double resistance bounce and then making 4,000 every 10 minutes is utter bullshit.

metadata.title: The TRUTH About Trading NOBODY Wants to Admit
